wordpressPost.title: How to leverage Big Data and UML to fight online fraud, spam, and abuse
wordpressPost.content:
Peter and Melissa from Speaking in Tech interview Julian Wong, VP of Customer Success at DataVisor (@DataVisor). Together, they discuss the world of online fraud, spam and abuse, and how to use big data and unsupervised machine learning to fight these scourges.

Listen to the podcast here.
wordpressPost.excerpt: Julian Wong, VP of Customer Success at DataVisor is interviewed about the world of online fraud, spam and abuse, and how to use big data and unsupervised machine learning to fight these scourges.
